QuestData.Title: Raggaran's Rage
QuestData.Description: The quilboar are a stain on the land that not even the river can wash away. They told me to evacuate, but I told them that my job was not yet done.$b$bHrrrraaagh! I hate quilboar so much! Will you help me kill them?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 4 Razormane Quilboar and 4 Razormane Scouts.
QuestData.RewardText: <Raggaran appears to have calmed down a bit since your last encounter.>$b$bGood, good. One step closer to eliminating those beady-eyed, basket-wearing, hog-nosed, two-toed...$b$b<Raggaran's anger is clearly rising again.>$b$b...hunchbacked, squealing, prickly... no-good... gnome-loving... GREEEAAAAGH! Quilboar!
